front.title: IEEE Standard for Information Technology--Portable Operating System Interface (POSIX(TM))--Part 2: Shell and Utilities--Amendment 1: Batch Environment
front.abstract: This amendment is part of the POSIX series of standards for applications and user interfaces to open systems. It is a supplement to IEEE Std 1003.2-1992, which defines the applications interface to a shell command language and a set of utility programs for complex data manipulation. This supplement defines the user interface to a distributed batch queuing environment and includes application environments..
